title: Aquaphor Baby Wash and Shampoo, Unscented Baby Shampoo and Wash, 25.4 Fl Oz Pump Bottle
description: Aquaphor Baby Wash and Shampoo was formulated for the sweet moments of baby bath time. This baby shampoo and body wash offers an extra mild 2 in 1 solution specially designed for your baby's sensitive skin. The Aquaphor baby shampoo and body wash formula is enriched with Chamomile essence and Provitamin B5 to soothe and cleanse baby's skin without drying, and to wash hair without irritating the scalp. This tear free baby shampoo cleanses with a light lather that rinses easily, and it's clinically proven to be gentle to baby's sensitive skin and scalp. The fragrance free baby wash and shampoo is also free of parabens and preservatives. To use, pump Aquaphor baby shampoo and baby body wash on moistened hands or wet washcloth, gently massage onto baby's skin and hair, and rinse with lukewarm water. A pump bottle allows for convenient, one-handed use of the baby body wash and shampoo. Each of the ingredients in Aquaphor skin care products are tested and approved for their quality and safety.
